channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 09:18 Alarm lifted in Chernihiv region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游릭 09:18 Alarm lifted in Chernihiv region. Follow further messages. #Chernihiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 08:06 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Follow the news for further updates.
item.description: 游릭 08:06 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Follow the news for further updates. #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
